# we-divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description                                             |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--divider-border`          | divider border <br> Default: 1px                        |
| `--divider-color`           | divider color <br> Default: rgb(255, 0, 0)              |
| `--divider-justify-content` | divider justify-content-center <br> Default: flex-start |
| `--divider-margin-left`     | divider margin-left <br> Default: 0px                   |
| `--divider-margin-right`    | divider margin-right <br> Default: 0px                  |
| `--divider-radius`          | divider radiues <br> Default: 0px                       |
| `--divider-style`           | divider style <br> Default: solid                       |
| `--divider-width`           | divider width <br> Default: 100%                        |
